data.title: Herbert Scott Scholarship
data.text:
This scholarship was established in 2016 for graduating Dayton Public School seniors who are currently in foster care or have aged out of foster care. Applicants must:

Be a graduating African-American senior from Dayton Public Schools

Be currently in foster care or have aged out of foster care. Documentation must be provided from a caseworker.

Be accepted or currently attending an accredited technical school, junior college, community college or four-year college or university

Donor

Herbert Scott Memorial Scholarship

Award

$1,000

Scopes

African American Community Foundation, Dayton Public Schools Scholarships

Deadline

03/29/2024

Supplemental Questions

Please provide the name and contact information for your case worker.

Are you currently in the foster-care system?

Have you aged out of the foster-care system?

Briefly explain your involvement with foster care. Please only provide information you are comfortable with sharing.
